segments.text: Here is your spicy diced chicken with peanuts , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . It looks very attractive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would advise you to enjoy the dish while it is hot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tasty and tender ! It must be one of the famous local dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And it must be very particular in cooking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right , sir . To prepare it , a Sichuan food chef first fries some chilli until they turn reddish brown , and then puts diced chicken breast meat into the pot with other condiments and peanuts . That's why the dish has a bright colour .
segments.speaker: S1
